name: enterprisegpt
description: EnterpriseGPT is an open-source web application built on top of OpenAI's GPT-3.5. It's designed for enterprise IT organizations who wish to utilize the AI model while ensuring their source code isn't submitted for analysis. This is achieved through a custom filtering mechanism within the application.

scripts.start:down-up: docker-compose down && docker-compose build && docker-compose up
scripts.start:no-cache: docker-compose down && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up

author: Keyhole Software
